summary: Completed comprehensive testing of textile samples module with 5 CRUD tables. All backend APIs and frontend UI functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: Dashboard loads with stats cards for all 5 tables
Navigation sidebar works - all menu items clickable
Marcas CRUD: Create, read, update, delete operations
Tipos Producto CRUD: All operations working
Telas CRUD: Create with composicion and peso_gsm fields working
Hilos CRUD: Create with color and grosor fields working
Search functionality working on all tables
Dashboard stats update correctly after adding records
All 30 backend API endpoints returning correct status codes
Form validation and error handling working
